<details>
<summary><small>Source: 10 lines (135 - 144)</small></summary>

```php
public function __construct(UserAgents $config = null)
{
	$this->config = $config ?? new UserAgents();

	if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']))
	{
		$this->agent = trim($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']);
		$this->compileData();
	}
}
```

</details>

</tr>
</table>





<details>
<summary><small>Source: 16 lines (155 - 170)</small></summary>

```php
public function isBrowser(string $key = null): bool
{
	if (! $this->isBrowser)
	{
		return false;
	}

	// No need to be specific, it's a browser
	if ($key === null)
	{
		return true;
	}

	// Check for a specific browser
	return (isset($this->config->browsers[$key]) && $this->browser === $this->config->browsers[$key]);
}
```

</details>


<hr>

<details>
<summary><small>Source: 16 lines (181 - 196)</small></summary>

```php
public function isRobot(string $key = null): bool
{
	if (! $this->isRobot)
	{
		return false;
	}

	// No need to be specific, it's a robot
	if ($key === null)
	{
		return true;
	}

	// Check for a specific robot
	return (isset($this->config->robots[$key]) && $this->robot === $this->config->robots[$key]);
}
```

</details>

<summary><small>Source: 16 lines (207 - 222)</small></summary>

```php
public function isMobile(string $key = null): bool
{
	if (! $this->isMobile)
	{
		return false;
	}

	// No need to be specific, it's a mobile
	if ($key === null)
	{
		return true;
	}

	// Check for a specific robot
	return (isset($this->config->mobiles[$key]) && $this->mobile === $this->config->mobiles[$key]);
}
```

</details>


<hr>

#### isReferral()

```php
public function isReferral() : bool
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
Is this a referral from another site?
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">
</table>





<table>
<tr>
<th style="vertical-align:top;">return</th>
<td>bool
</td>
</tr>
</table>





<details>
<summary><small>Source: 19 lines (231 - 249)</small></summary>

```php
public function isReferral(): bool
{
	if (! isset($this->referrer))
	{
		if (empty($_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER']))
		{
			$this->referrer = false;
		}
		else
		{
			$referer_host = @parse_url($_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER'], PHP_URL_HOST);
			$own_host     = parse_url(\base_url(), PHP_URL_HOST);

			$this->referrer = ($referer_host && $referer_host !== $own_host);
		}
	}

	return $this->referrer;
}
```

</details>

```php
public function getReferrer(): string
{
	return empty($_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER']) ? '' : trim($_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER']);
}
```

#### parse()

```php
public function parse(string $string)
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
Parse a custom user-agent string
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>

</table>

<tr>
<th>#</th>
<th>Variable</th>

<th>Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>

<tr>
<td>1.</td>

<td><em>string
</em></td>
<td>false</td>
<td></td>
</tr>


</tbody>
</table>



<table>
<tr>
<th style="vertical-align:top;">return</th>
<td>void
</td>
</tr>
</table>





<details>
<summary><small>Source: 19 lines (343 - 361)</small></summary>

```php
public function parse(string $string)
{
	// Reset values
	$this->isBrowser = false;
	$this->isRobot   = false;
	$this->isMobile  = false;
	$this->browser   = '';
	$this->version   = '';
	$this->mobile    = '';
	$this->robot     = '';

	// Set the new user-agent string and parse it, unless empty
	$this->agent = $string;

	if (! empty($string))
	{
		$this->compileData();
	}
}
```

</details>


<hr>

#### compileData()

```php
protected function compileData()
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
Compile the User Agent Data
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">
</table>





<table>
<tr>
<th style="vertical-align:top;">return</th>
<td>void
</td>
</tr>
</table>





<details>
<summary><small>Source: 12 lines (369 - 380)</small></summary>

```php
protected function compileData()
{
	$this->setPlatform();

	foreach (['setRobot', 'setBrowser', 'setMobile'] as $function)
	{
		if ($this->$function() === true)
		{
			break;
		}
	}
}
```

</details>


<hr>

#### setPlatform()

```php
protected function setPlatform() : bool
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
Set the Platform
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">
</table>





<table>
<tr>
<th style="vertical-align:top;">return</th>
<td>bool
</td>
</tr>
</table>





<details>
<summary><small>Source: 19 lines (389 - 407)</small></summary>

```php
protected function setPlatform(): bool
{
	if (is_array($this->config->platforms) && $this->config->platforms)
	{
		foreach ($this->config->platforms as $key => $val)
		{
			if (preg_match('|' . preg_quote($key) . '|i', $this->agent))
			{
				$this->platform = $val;

				return true;
			}
		}
	}

	$this->platform = 'Unknown Platform';

	return false;
}
```

</details>


<hr>

#### setBrowser()

```php
protected function setBrowser() : bool
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
Set the Browser
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">
</table>





<table>
<tr>
<th style="vertical-align:top;">return</th>
<td>bool
</td>
</tr>
</table>





<details>
<summary><small>Source: 20 lines (416 - 435)</small></summary>

```php
protected function setBrowser(): bool
{
	if (is_array($this->config->browsers) && $this->config->browsers)
	{
		foreach ($this->config->browsers as $key => $val)
		{
			if (preg_match('|' . $key . '.*?([0-9\.]+)|i', $this->agent, $match))
			{
				$this->isBrowser = true;
				$this->version   = $match[1];
				$this->browser   = $val;
				$this->setMobile();

				return true;
			}
		}
	}

	return false;
}
```

</details>


<hr>

#### setRobot()

```php
protected function setRobot() : bool
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<tr><td>
Set the Robot
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">
</table>





<table>
<tr>
<th style="vertical-align:top;">return</th>
<td>bool
</td>
</tr>
</table>





<details>
<summary><small>Source: 19 lines (444 - 462)</small></summary>

```php
protected function setRobot(): bool
{
	if (is_array($this->config->robots) && $this->config->robots)
	{
		foreach ($this->config->robots as $key => $val)
		{
			if (preg_match('|' . preg_quote($key) . '|i', $this->agent))
			{
				$this->isRobot = true;
				$this->robot   = $val;
				$this->setMobile();

				return true;
			}
		}
	}

	return false;
}
```

</details>

#### setMobile()

```php
protected function setMobile() : bool
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
Set the Mobile Device
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">
</table>





<table>
<tr>
<th style="vertical-align:top;">return</th>
<td>bool
</td>
</tr>
</table>





<details>
<summary><small>Source: 18 lines (471 - 488)</small></summary>

```php
protected function setMobile(): bool
{
	if (is_array($this->config->mobiles) && $this->config->mobiles)
	{
		foreach ($this->config->mobiles as $key => $val)
		{
			if (false !== (stripos($this->agent, $key)))
			{
				$this->isMobile = true;
				$this->mobile   = $val;

				return true;
			}
		}
	}

	return false;
}
```

</details>
